cast.name: 朱丽叶·比诺什 Juliette Binoche
弗洛伦斯·亨特 Florence Hunt
安娜·考尔德-马歇尔 Anna Calder-Marshall

introduction: Now comes word (via a tiny blurb in Variety) that she is set to return to work on Lance Hammer‘s long awaited sophomore feature. We knew that there was a project secretly making the rounds several years back but this is the first mention of the film’s existence.We imagine this will be an intimate film – but what’s intriguing about the Binoche casting choice is that there’ll be a foreigner presence on project set in America.Obviously, we don’t know a lot about the new Hammer film, but it is being rumored the film is actually titled, “A Queen at Sea.” At least that’s the working title. Any other details are unknown. But it’s exciting to see Hammer with a project coming soon.
